00430         inline void setIPv6(bool bSet)
00431         {
00432                 if(bSet)m_uFlags |= KVI_IRCSERVER_FLAG_IPV6;
00433                 else m_uFlags &= ((unsigned short)~KVI_IRCSERVER_FLAG_IPV6);
00434         };
00435 
00441         inline void setUseSSL(bool bSet)
00442         {
00443                 if(bSet)m_uFlags |= KVI_IRCSERVER_FLAG_SSL;
00444                 else m_uFlags &= ((unsigned short)~KVI_IRCSERVER_FLAG_SSL);
00445         };

00463         inline void setCacheIp(bool bSet)
00464         {
